glsa.title: PHP: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in PHP, the worst of which could result in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: PHP is an open source general-purpose scripting language that is especially suited for web development.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in PHP. Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
